name: ionic-lwc-barebones
description: Use LWC components in an Ionic Angular app
author: Rupert Barrow

scripts.install: npm run install:lwc-component && npm run install:app
scripts.build: npm run build:lwc-component   && npm run build:app
scripts.start: npm run build:lwc-component   && npm run start:app
scripts.serve: npm run build:lwc-component   && npm run serve:app
